name: Oxvo, celtic slide puzzle
description:
Oxvo -new life of classic sliding puzzle15 with new innvative celtic knotwork design by Cameron Browne.
Oxvo is a solitaire puzzle in which the player slides knotwork tile segments around in order to complete closed paths. Each move involves sliding one, two or three tiles towards the empty cell, as per any other 15-puzzle. The aim is to form the longest possible path in the shortest number of turns. Try to make LARGEST PATH, thats not so easy as common puzzle15.

tags: puzzle; 15; celtic; knotwork; path; connectivity; segments; fun ; hard challenge; slide; puzzle15;
